section.section: In this section the following words have the meanings indicated.
"Board" means the Board of Public Works.
"License" means a license under § 16-202 of this article.

text.section:
This section applies to:
A permit listed under § 1-601(a) of this subtitle;
A permit listed under § 5-204(f) of this article; or
A license issued under § 16-202 of this article.

section.section:
When a draft permit or license or tentative determination is issued, the Department or Board shall:
Make available for inspection and copying no later than the date the permit, draft license, or tentative determination is issued:
Extend the public comment period by 60 days on request by a person.

A request submitted to the Department or Board under paragraph (1)(ii) of this subsection shall be:
Submitted in writing; and
Made before the expiration of the original comment period.
A public comment period may not be extended more than once under paragraph (1)(ii) of this subsection.
